delivery_messages.msg: What kind of activity do you want to try with your child?
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message for choosing which type of activity to do. Types in "activity_type_data"

delivery_messages.msg: This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: hook message sent after 3 days of no response from the user. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "no_response". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

delivery_messages.msg: Let’s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message received before the first module. It has a NEXT button, where NEXT can be replaced by anything  (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

delivery_messages.msg: You’ve completed the {prog_name} – well done! There are no new tips available, but you can always review any of the completed tips by selecting option 1 in the {MENU}

congrats_data.msg:
You’ve completed the programme – well done!
Remember, you can always return to {prog_name} to review any of the tips. Just type {MENU}.

We’ll check in with you in a month to see how you’re doing. Your feedback helps us make sure these tips truly support families like yours 🙂

make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: The tip you haven't finished is:
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: Which tip would you like to receive?

make_options_wrapper_data.msg_no_options.message: You haven't received any tips yet.
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: You have received the following tips:
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.question: Would you like to review it?
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.no_message: That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl out of @fields.n_s_modules tips. Which of the following tips would you like to review?

description_data.msg: In this program, you will receive @fields.c_n_mod tips. Your first tip is "@results.name".

wa_templates_META.text:
It’s a difficult moment for your family. I’m here today with a few tips to create small moments of connection with your child to give them the routine and stability you all need right now. 

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Continue with my registration
2. Remind me tomorrow

It looks like you started answering some baseline questions but didn't get a chance to finish. Would you like to continue now and then we can move onto the tips?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Continue my initial questions
2. Remind me tomorrow

It looks like you started a tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. Would you like to finish it or start learning someting new?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Finish the previous tip
2. Receive a new tip
3. Remind me tomorrow

It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Receive the remaining information
2. Remind me tomorrow
3. I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot

It looks like you have started, but not finished, {{1}} tips. What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Receive the remaining information
2. Remind me tomorrow
3. I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot

You and your family are facing a challenging time. {prog_name} provides tips on how you can support your child during this crisis. Would you like to recieve your first tips now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

New tips are ready for you. Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💛 We’re thinking of you today. There are simple things you can do to help your child cope. Would you like to learn about them? 

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

✨ Today’s tips can help your child feel more safe. Would you like to learn more? 

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

Today’s tips offer you some ways you can stay calm and also encourage your children during times of uncertainty 🌱. 
Would you like to receive them?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

🧡 Planning to travel with your child soon?
Today’s tips can help you prepare to stay safe— Would you like to learn more?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💛 In stressful moments, even simple actions can help keep your child safe and close. Today’s tips share how to stay connected and calm when traveling.
Would you like to receive them?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💡 Many parents are having quiet talks with their children about staying safe. Today’s tips explain how to keep your child safe from harassment in a calm, age-appropriate way.

Would you like to receive them?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

🕊️ In war and other tough times, children notice more than we think. Today’s tips help you talk to your child about death so they can feel safer, less confused, and more supported. Would you like to receive the tips?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

🌿 Building strength in tough times starts with simple steps. Would you like to learn how to promote good behaviors and stay strong together?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow
This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.

Can you believe it’s been a month? ⏳
We’d love to check in and see how you’re doing ❤️. It’ll take less than 5 minutes.
Is now a good time? 🙂

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No

🕊️ In tough times, children notice more than we think. Today’s tips help you talk to your child about death so they can feel safer, less confused, and more supported. Would you like to receive the tips?

💡 Many parents are having quiet talks with their children about staying safe. Today’s tips explain how to keep your child safe from harassment in a calm, age-appropriate way.

Would you like to receive them?

💛 Keeping kids safe can feel overwhelming, but a clear plan helps. Today's tip shows you simple ways to help your child feel safe and supported in uncertain times. 

Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💛 In stressful moments, even simple actions can help keep your child safe and close. Today’s tips share how to stay connected and calm when traveling.
Would you like to receive them?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💛 It can be frightening to think about traffickers, but talking with your child helps protect them. Today’s tip shows you simple ways to keep your child safe and aware.

Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💛 Sometimes families need to stay in a shelter during emergencies or unsafe times. Today’s tip shares simple ways to help your child feel safe and cared for there.

Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

🕊️ In times of crisis, some children may hurt others with words or actions because of fear or stress. Today’s tip shows you how to recognize bullying and protect your child. 

Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow

💛 Children often turn to phones and the internet to learn, play, and connect, but sometimes they can also be bullied online. Today’s tip helps you notice the signs and keep your child safe and supported. 

Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad: 
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow
